title: CHIPPIN' Away
body_text:
HIT The HUMAN
Returns!
And "it aint always pretty!"
The comedic yet rarely seen
Hit the Human
pregame competition served as the main focus heading into the 144th. Former season finale headliner and future DODGEBALL 150 main eventer
Juan Londono
came out the sole survivor in this one, outlasting Brent Bitsko, Chris Adams, Michelle Mullins, Justin Pierce, Kristen Driscoll, Kevin Fitzpatrick, Travis Mills, Bobby Vetrano, Eamon Fitzpatrick, Lenny Herrera, Mike "Sputz" Krott, Ryan Letsche, and finalists Kevin Adams and John Tronolone.   "The Cockroach" proceeded to arrange players on one of two coalitions which yielded this magnificent display of pure athleticism.
Flash Results by Game
DORITOS: 1, 2, 4, 5, 6
FRITOS: 3
The Rules
: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match
: Team DORITOS defeated Team FRITOS, 5 - 1.
Moments & Stars
: Travis Mills and Kevin Adams colliding during an opening rush; Tricia Conway catching a Kevin Megill fastball; Travis Mills's hilarious "Urkel" impression; not a single DORITOS member eliminated during Game 1
Attendance
: 28, comprised 20 men and 8 women
Other Notes
: DODGEBALL CXLIV featured just the third
Hit the Human
contest, with Juan winning his second [consecutive]. Justin Pierce served as "victim" in the
HTH
contest and has done so every time.
Hit the Human
Contest History
DODGEBALL LVII
..
DODGEBALL 96
MidSeason Main Event
MICHAEL EDWARDS vs. KEVIN ADAMS
body_html:
HIT The HUMAN Returns!
And "it aint always pretty!"

The comedic yet rarely seen Hit the Human pregame competition served as the main focus heading into the 144th. Former season finale headliner and future DODGEBALL 150 main eventer Juan Londono came out the sole survivor in this one, outlasting Brent Bitsko, Chris Adams, Michelle Mullins, Justin Pierce, Kristen Driscoll, Kevin Fitzpatrick, Travis Mills, Bobby Vetrano, Eamon Fitzpatrick, Lenny Herrera, Mike "Sputz" Krott, Ryan Letsche, and finalists Kevin Adams and John Tronolone. "The Cockroach" proceeded to arrange players on one of two coalitions which yielded this magnificent display of pure athleticism.

Flash Results by Game
DORITOS: 1, 2, 4, 5, 6
FRITOS: 3

The Rules: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match: Team DORITOS defeated Team FRITOS, 5 - 1.
Moments & Stars: Travis Mills and Kevin Adams colliding during an opening rush; Tricia Conway catching a Kevin Megill fastball; Travis Mills's hilarious "Urkel" impression; not a single DORITOS member eliminated during Game 1
Attendance: 28, comprised 20 men and 8 women
Other Notes: DODGEBALL CXLIV featured just the third Hit the Human contest, with Juan winning his second [consecutive]. Justin Pierce served as "victim" in the HTH contest and has done so every time.

Hit the Human Contest History
DODGEBALL LVII .. DODGEBALL 96

MidSeason Main Event
MICHAEL EDWARDS vs. KEVIN ADAMS
